---
title: fastqc
---

Fastqc component, please see https://www.bioinformatics.babraham.ac.uk/projects/fastqc/. This component can take one or more files (by means of shell globbing) or a complete directory.


## Argument help

Run the following command to view the module's help page:
```bash
nextflow run openpipelines-bio/openpipeline -r main_build -main-script target/nextflow/qc/fastqc/main.nf --help
```

### Arguments



:::{.column-body-outset}
|Name       |Description                                                        |Attributes                           |
|:----------|:------------------------------------------------------------------|:------------------------------------|
|`--mode`   |The mode in which the component works. Can be either files or dir. |string, default: "files"             |
|`--input`  |Directory containing input fastq files.                            |file, required, example: "fastq_dir" |
|`--output` |Output directory to write reports to.                              |file, required, example: "qc"        |
:::
